meta.title: An Overview of the Kulung Region

nodes.body: The Kulung are a Rai ethnic group of eastern Nepal who speak a Tibeto-Burman language of the same name. According to the 2001 census of Nepal, 18,686 people speak Kulung as a mother tongue. (Mark Turin – June 01, 2004)
nodes.title: An Overview of the Kulung Region
